name: Tap Hold and Load in 4k
description: Project is about a memecoin around the fresh trend "tap, hold and load in 4k", here's a brief recap of what it's all about : "What Does 'Tap, Hold And Load In 4K' Mean? In 2020, Twitter began rolling out a feature that allows mobile users to tap and hold on certain, high-quality images to load them in 4K. This allows for much better resolution. In 2021 the features went public for everyone, and since then, there have been numerous posts that have taken advantage of it. Then, on January 9th, 2025, Twitter user @ImNathanBennett shared a photo of a starry night sky, writing, "tap, hold and load in 4k to see even more stars ðŸ¤©." The post went viral with over 230,000 likes in under a week and inspired others to post their 4K photos to the app, specifically using the phrase "tap, hold and load in 4K" alongside them."
